title: Stellar Climbs 3.5% to $0.25 as Technical Recovery Gains Momentum
contentSnippet: Network fundamentals improved alongside price action as token demonstrated resilience following recent consolidation period.

title: Stand With Crypto to vet 2026 candidates on digital asset positions
contentSnippet: After the crypto industry’s success in influencing the 2024 US elections, an advocacy group announced plans to continue its efforts for the 2026 midterms.

title: 'Privacy Is Hygiene,’ Says Ethereum Creator Vitalik Buterin After Bank Data Leak
contentSnippet: A major security breach impacting U.S. banks has renewed debate on privacy as interest in crypto privacy tools and protocols grows.

title: HBAR Gains 2.4% From Major Support as Axelar Integration Drives DeFi Activity
contentSnippet: Volume surge validates advance despite token's underperformance versus broader crypto market rally.

title: Bitcoin rallies as US dollar strengthens: Are crypto traders walking into a trap?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin reclaimed $86,000 as the US dollar strengthened, but one analyst warned the rally may be structurally weak.

title: Franklin Templeton Joins XRP ETF Race, Calling It ‘Foundational’ to Global Finance
contentSnippet: With XRPZ debuting on NYSE Arca, Franklin becomes the latest financial heavyweight betting on crypto’s future in global payments.

title: Crypto Market Mood Lifted as Amazon Pours $50B Into AI Infrastructure
contentSnippet: The price of bitcoin jumped back above $87,000 and crypto miners with a focus on AI/high-performance computing are surging.

title: Neobank Revolut Boosts Valuation to $75 Billion Ahead of Potential Stablecoin Launch
contentSnippet: Revolut’s share sale attracted investors like Fidelity and Franklin Templeton as the neobank continues expanding its crypto offerings.

title: BitMine Shares Stop Bleeding on $195 Million Ethereum Buy
contentSnippet: The company was valued at a discount to its Ethereum holdings.

contentSnippet: The advance occurred alongside a rally in data center and high-performance computing stocks.

title: Grayscale Dogecoin, XRP ETFs Add to Flurry of Altcoin Fund Debuts
contentSnippet: New XRP and DOGE ETFs from digital asset focused investment firm Grayscale are now live for trading on NYSE Arca.

title: BTC @ $86K! Monad presale Oversubscribed! Coinbase acquires Vector Dot Fun
contentSnippet: Crypto majors slipped slightly after the weekend rally cooled, with BTC down 1% at $86,000, ETH down 1% at $2,800, BNB down 1% at $840, and SOL down 1% at $129. Among top movers, CC (+12%), XDC (+3%),

title: Zcash down 30% from November’s top: Will ZEC price crash further?
contentSnippet: Analysts warn of “pump-and-dump” risks associated with ZEC’s sudden surge in hype, even as major crypto figures maintain a long-term bullish outlook.

title: Monad’s MON Token Stumbles Out of the Gate in Trading Debut After Slow Token Sale
contentSnippet: Soft demand, low volume and concerns over token distribution weighed on early market sentiment.

title: What Next for DOGE Price as Grayscale's GDOG ETF Debuts?
contentSnippet: The $0.1495 resistance level remains a significant barrier, while $0.144 serves as the last short-term support.

title: Bitcoin price $80K low was bottom, thinks Arthur Hayes
contentSnippet: Bitcoin found its latest floor when it dropped to nearly $80,000 last week, the latest BTC price prediction by ex-BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes said.

title: Morning Minute: Bitcoin Crashes, Then Snaps Back
contentSnippet: Black Friday saw Bitcoin go as low as $81,000 before a weekend rebound brought relief.

title: Bitcoin’s $1T Rout Exposes Fragile Market Structure, Deutsche Bank Says
contentSnippet: The bitcoin price drop to $80,000 last week reflected a mix of macro pressure, fading regulatory momentum and thinning liquidity that has tested bitcoin’s maturity.

title: XRP Slides to $2.08 as Grayscale’s GXRP ETF Debut Fails to Ignite Market
contentSnippet: Traders should watch for potential breakdowns below $2.03, which could lead to further declines toward $1.91.

title: BitMine Immersion Added Nearly 70K Ether Last Week, Now Holding 3% of ETH Supply
contentSnippet: Tom Lee's company increased its crypto holdings last week despite sitting on around $4 billion in unrealized losses on its ETH bet.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Prediction Market Myriad Hits $100M Milestone, Growing 10x in Three Months
contentSnippet: The prediction market protocol’s rapid growth shows the “massive demand” for a marketplace of forecasts and insights, its founders said.

title: Quantum computers won’t break Bitcoin’s code, they’ll break its politics
contentSnippet: Bitcoin analyst James Check argued Bitcoin’s quantum risk is chiefly a consensus dilemma — not a tech one — because the network is unlikely to freeze legacy coins.

title: Hyperliquid’s $314M unlock fuels calls for clarity, sell-pressure warnings
contentSnippet: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes said Hyperliquid’s $314 million unlock brings unavoidable sell pressure, and insider assurances can’t remove uncertainty.

title: Blockchain is struggling to hold on to its original purpose: Aztec CEO
contentSnippet: Blockchain can still serve its purpose while catering to institutional finance needs through privacy technology, says Aztec Labs’ Zac Williamson.

title: $1.9B exodus and flicker of hope hits crypto investment funds: CoinShares
contentSnippet: Crypto investment products neared $5 billion in outflows in the last four weeks, but late-week inflows show early signs of improving sentiment despite heavy selling, CoinShares said.

title: How India’s VDA review may strengthen protections across the crypto ecosystem
contentSnippet: From custody standards to stablecoin oversight, India’s VDA review may help shape an investor-focused framework that brings crypto rules closer to global norms.

title: Upbit Operator Dunamu, Naver Financial to Vote on Merger as Market Eyes Possible IPO Path
contentSnippet: Other Asian tech conglomerates are watching closely as the region races to launch stablecoins, an expert told Decrypt.

title: Solana Holders Under Pressure as Sell-Off Deepens
contentSnippet: With 80% of SOL holders underwater and $239M in longs at risk, analysts warn of panic selling but see long-term value in ETF inflows.

title: Thief Posing as Delivery Driver Ties Up Homeowner, Steals $11M in Crypto
contentSnippet: The incident in San Francisco adds to a record year of physical attacks on crypto holders, with cases averaging one a week.

title: ブラックロック、ビットコイン投資の本質は「デジタルゴールド」　機関投資家が重視する“真の価値”とは？
contentSnippet: 世界最大の資産運用会社ブラックロックのデジタル資産部門責任者が、機関投資家がビットコインに投資する理由を解説した。「デジタルゴールド」としての価値保存機能が重視される一方、決済手段としての利用は依然投機的との見方を示した。

title: ソラナのインフレ率を下げる改善提案　今後6年で2,230万SOLの発行量削減見込む
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナのコミュニティがインフレ減少率を引き上げる改善提案を公開した。目標インフレ率への到達が6年から3年に短縮する見込みだ。

title: 「仮想通貨市場の弱体化、背景にマーケットメーカーの機能不全」トム・リーが指摘
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長が仮想通貨市場の下落が続いている要因を分析した。10月10日の清算イベントがマーケットメーカーを機能不全にしていると見解を示している。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ヴィタリック紹介のイーサリアム新ツールやXRPのステーキング導入案など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン売られ過ぎでも反転せず、12月FOMCの据え置きが現実味を増す｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のBTC対円相場は1400万円割れまで下落。ヌビディア好決算後も1400万円割れが続き、米雇用統計の強弱まちまちな内容が見通し悪化を助長。12月FOMCでの金利据え置き観測が強まる。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜金融庁の暗号資産規制方針やビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、金融庁の仮想通貨規制方針、ビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達、ビットコインとイーサリアムの市況分析に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: ANAPホールディングス、企業向けビットコイン戦略支援「ビットコイン道場」を開始
contentSnippet: ANAPホールディングスが企業のビットコイン活用を支援する継続型プログラム「ANAPビットコイン道場」の提供を開始した。会計や税務などの実務を専門家が包括的にサポートし、参加企業がコミュニティ形式で課題解決に取り組む仕組みを提供する。

title: コンヴァノがビットコイン戦略から本業回帰、AI・ヘルスケア事業に注力へ
contentSnippet: コンヴァノが仮想通貨ビットコインを最大約2万BTC取得する計画を取り下げ、成長中の事業へ軸足を移す。業績予想を上方修正しており本業成長を重視する戦略転換となる。

title: 米当局がビットメイン製品を国家安全保障リスクで調査、トランプ関連企業も1万6000台使用
contentSnippet: 米国土安全保障省が中国メーカーのビットメインを調査し、機器がスパイ活動や電力網破壊に使用される可能性を指摘。トランプ大統領の息子たちの会社アメリカン・ビットコインも1万6000台を購入した。

title: コインベース、ソラナのミームコイン取引所「ベクター」を買収
contentSnippet: コインベースがソラナ基盤SocialFiプラットフォーム「ベクター・ファン」を買収すると発表した。年内に取引完了予定で、ソラナエコシステムへの参入を拡大し、すべてを取引できる取引所の構築を目指す。
